Financial Services Infrastructure

Move and Manage Money Globally
Any Business. Anywhere. Any Web.

Access licensing and technical infrastructure for enterprise businesses. Real-time payments, industry-specific solutions and interoperability across fiat and digital currencies.

FIND OUR MORECONTACT OUR TEAM
Powering the growth of the digital economy. Rail-agnostic infrastructure seamlessly combines traditional finance and digital assets under one API. Build and scale in the digital age.
1-

Embed accounts and payments wherever theyre needed in your product environment. Whatever youre building, our tech will give you the functionality you need.

Get access to a global network of partners and infrastructure, wherever your customers need you to be.

Count on high availability, strong security standards and fully redundant systems.

Simplify your internal workflows with a platform thats designed to adapt to your needs.

Your vision, our technology
Regulatory coverage on a global scale
Streamline your back office operations
Ultimate reliability platform

The universal financial infrastructure

Digital businesses deserve better banking and payments. Too many are still trying to build modern user experiences on top of decades-old infrastructure. We knew there must be a better way.

At OpenPayd, were powering the growth of the digital economy through a universal financial infrastructure. Using our API-led platform, innovative companies can build new products, streamline their operations and manage their payments on a global scale.

Products

Payments

Harness our global payments network

Domestic. International. Real-time. Our ever-expanding network keeps your payments fast and user-friendly, wherever you operate.

Accounts

Every account in one place

Manage all your company and customer balances with one powerful account infrastructure thats built for scale.

Trading

Rail-agnostic money movement

24/7 cross-border money movements and exchange through local and international fiat rails and all main blockchain rails.

Every payment, one dashboard
Manage any payment, in any currency, through the OpenPayd online portal. Track incoming payments, initiate payouts and make FX transfers across every account, all in one place
Named IBANs across multiple currencies
Issue an unlimited number of virtual IBANs for your users or business payments, automating your payment processing and removing reconciliation pain.
Transparent FX rates
Every foreign exchange payment you make through the OpenPayd platform has one up-front rate, giving you complete clarity of what youre paying for.
SANDBOX

Built for Developers

Our intuitive, fully-documented REST API is designed, built, and maintained by developers, for developers. Go live in a matter of days with our simple integration and access to industry-leading support. Want to explore first? Get instant access to our sandbox environment.

Sandbox

Our sandbox is a testing environment where you can see how to use our API to create accounts, manage transactions, make payments and more.
SANDBOX

Documentation

We dont believe in surprises. All our integration documentation, guides and API reference information are available in one place.
DOCUMENTATION

cURL
curl --location --request POST 'https://sandbox.openpayd.com/api/oauth/token?grant_type=client_credentials \
--header 'Authorization: Basic base64(username:password)' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded'

Connected IBANs

This partnership is an example of embedded finance in action; its a significant evolution in how we build innovative financial services. With every customer receiving their own virtual IBAN and access to the real-time European payment rails, SEPA Instant, we can ensure that funds are moving when, how and to whom theyre supposed to.

OpenPayd is enabling us to innovate ahead of demand, embedding new financial services products into our offering, and transforming personal finance and wealth management for our customers.

Cyrus Fazel - Founder at SwissBorg

quot;OpenPayd's unique API-driven infrastructure will help our teams continue to shape the future of payments, automating time-consuming processes, delivering improved operational efficiency and an even better service for our customers.&quot

Rupert Lee-Browne - CEO at Caxton

We chose to work with OpenPayd because of its ability to help us access SEPA real-time payment rails and the speed of integration its API enables. This collaboration forms part of our continued efforts to provide a premium customer service experience to our growing user base.

Paolo Ardoino - CTO at Bitfinex
